title: Deals: Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S7 FE falls to $423, TCL 5-Series Google TV $100 off, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are now headlined by a new low on Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S7 FE at $423. That’s alongside TCL’s all-new 5-Series 65-inch 4K QLED Google TV at $100 off and this ASUS Chromebook CM3 with detachable keyboard. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S7 FE falls to $423, TCL 5-Series Google TV $100 off, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Galaxy Tab S7 FE falls to a new Amazon all-time low at $423 to complement the best price of the year on the ASUS Chromebook CM3.
